election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1807 State Senate, District 7

overview.note: The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) from October 26, 1807 lists Thomas Campbell with 2343 total votes.

sub_unit.name: Adams
sub_unit.note: The Freeman's Journal, and Philadelphia Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) from October 21, Adams Centinel from October 14, and The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) from October 27 list Campbell with 706 votes and Spangler with 185 votes. However, the Adams Centinel from October 21 explains that "the returns [previously] published were not quite correct, the following is correct from the official returns."

sub_unit.name: York
sub_unit.note: The Tree of Liberty (Pittsburgh, PA) from November 3 lists George Spangler with 1159 votes.
